details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.2.10 Fonts - 6.2.10.3 Composite fonts - CIDToGIDMap
details.description: ISO 32000-2:2020, 9.7.4 Table 115 requires that all embedded Type 2 CIDFonts, the CIDFont dictionary shall contain a CIDToGIDMap entry that shall be a stream mapping from CIDs to glyph indices or the name Identity, as described in ISO 32000-2:2020, 9.7.4 Table 115.
